verbs.description: Iff [ARG0: we] [V: want] [ARG1: Trump to be held accountable for the falsehoods he makes on a constant basis] , then the media should hold itself to such a standard .
Iff we want Trump to [V: be] held accountable for the falsehoods he makes on a constant basis , then the media should hold itself to such a standard .
Iff we want Trump to be [V: held] [ARG1: accountable for the falsehoods he makes on a constant basis] , then the media should hold itself to such a standard .
Iff we want Trump to be held accountable for [ARG1: the falsehoods] [ARG0: he] [V: makes] [ARGM-TMP: on a constant basis] , then the media should hold itself to such a standard .
Iff we want Trump to be held accountable for the falsehoods he makes on a constant basis , then the media [V: should] hold itself to such a standard .

[ARGM-ADV: Iff we want Trump to be held accountable for the falsehoods he makes on a constant basis] , [ARGM-DIS: then] [ARG0: the media] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: hold] [ARG1: itself] [ARG2: to such a standard] .
